data.eml:eml: The genus Scaphidium Olivier in East China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scaphidiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tang, Liang, Li, Li-Zhen, He, Wen-Jia (2014): The genus Scaphidium Olivier in East China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scaphidiinae). ZooKeys 403: 47-96, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.403.7220, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.403.7220
